DOC.brief_summary: To compare bioavailability single dose certolizumab pegol solution give subcutaneously either one three formulation investigate safety tolerability .
DOC.brief_title: Bio-availability Comparison Three Formulations Certolizumab Pegol Healthy Volunteers
DOC.criteria: Healthy male female volunteer age 18 55 Body Mass Index ( BMI ) 18 30 kg/m2 normal laboratory data negative Tuberculosis test normal Electrocardiogram ( ECG ) adequate contraception female give informed consent Any significant abnormality medical history , physical examination , laboratory test Intake concomitant medication smoke 10 cigarette per day alcohol drug abuse pregnancy breast feed history tuberculosis participation another trial within 3 month prior study previous administration certolizumab pegol
